name: test_e2e_with_logs[018_SQLI_BYPASS_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_004` |
| **Name** | Parenthesis-based WAF bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION(SELECT(version()),NULL,NULL)--`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20UNION%28SELECT%28version%28%29%29%2CNULL%2CNULL%29--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~23000ms
- **Timestamp**: 04:53:40.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BYPASS_004-1767070420936-tdhy2d pattern_id=SQLI_BYPASS_004 uri=/?q=%27%20UNION%28SELECT%28version%28%29%29%2CNULL%2CNULL%29-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
